about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 204: Seas of Sand

From the dry depths of the deep desert an exciting new adventure awaits! This sandy selection of Egyptian inspired pack contains a full 37 tokens sure to satisfy your tomb delving thrill seekers! From the feline goddess Bast, to Egyptian commoners, nobles, and soldiers in multiple poses, this pack also contains super selection of sarcophagi sure to liven up your next dungeon! Grab them now before the curse of the tomb befalls you!
